text: Civilized countries generally adopt gold or silver or both as money.
author: Alfred Marshall

text: Don't judge me. I made a lot of money.
author: Samantha Bee

text: If you make a living, if you earn your own money, you're free - however free one can be on this planet.
author: Theodore White

text: Money is a mechanism for control.
author: David Korten

text: All money means to me is a pride in accomplishment.
author: Ray Kroc
